00052 static inline void
00053 ctk_dma_2d_transfer(void *ls_addr, ea_addr_t ea_base, int region_size_x, int transfer_start_x, int transfer_start_y, int transfer_size_x, int transfer_size_y, int tag, int cmd)
00054 {
00055     int i;
00056 #if 0
00057     ctk_dma_list_va_t list;
00058     ctk_dma_list_va_init(&list, ls_addr, ea_base);
00059     ctk_dma_list_va_alloc_elems(&list, transfer_size_y);
00060     for (i = 0; i < transfer_size_y; i++) {
00061         ea_addr_t addr = ea_base + (transfer_start_y + i) * region_size_x 
00062                                       + transfer_start_x;
00063         ctk_dma_list_va_add_elem(&list, addr, transfer_size_x);
00064     }
00065     ctk_dma_list_va_transfer(&list, tag, cmd);
00066     ctk_dma_list_va_free_elems(&list)
00067 #else
00068     for (i = 0; i < transfer_size_y; i++) {
00069         ea_addr_t addr = ea_base + (transfer_start_y + i) * region_size_x 
00070                                       + transfer_start_x;
00071         spu_mfcdma64((volatile void*)((ls_addr_t)ls_addr + transfer_size_x * i),
00072             ea_hi32(addr), ea_lo32(addr), transfer_size_x, tag, cmd);
00073     }
00074 #endif
00075 }

00089 static inline void
00090 ctk_dma_2d_get(void *ls_addr, ea_addr_t ea_base, int region_size_x, int transfer_start_x, int transfer_start_y, int transfer_size_x, int transfer_size_y, int tag)
00091 {
00092     ctk_dma_2d_transfer(ls_addr, ea_base, region_size_x, 
00093         transfer_start_x, transfer_start_y, 
00094         transfer_size_x, transfer_size_y,
00095         tag, MFC_GET_CMD);
00096 }

00110 static inline void
00111 ctk_dma_2d_get_block(void *ls_addr, ea_addr_t ea_base, int region_size_x, int transfer_start_x, int transfer_start_y, int transfer_size_x, int transfer_size_y, int cmd)
00112 {
00113     int tag = ctk_dma_new_tag();
00114     ctk_dma_2d_get(ls_addr, ea_base, region_size_x, 
00115         transfer_start_x, transfer_start_y, 
00116         transfer_size_x, transfer_size_y,
00117         tag);
00118     ctk_dma_wait(tag);
00119 }
